main.name: Damon Schulz
main.bio: I never thought I'd be the person to have a computer job, although I have always been fascinated by technology. Now that I am properly trained, I couldn't be more proud and excited to give my next employer everything I have!
main.contactmessage: Whether you have feedback, want to talk jobs, or just want to chat I would love to hear from you!

resume.skillmessage: I may be new, but I devote all my time to learning about computer programming.

education.description: Throughout this 16 week course we completed over a dozen projects, working on both front and back end technologies.

work.title: Seaman , Construction Electrician
work.description: Supervised, managed, and trained teams of five Navy Sailors.
work.descriptionTwo: Ensured all safety requirements and Federal Electrical Codes were maintained throughout a project.
work.descriptionThree: Performed Quality Control to verify standards were met.
work.descriptionFour: Regularly learned and applied troubleshooting techniques to complete difficult tasks.
work.descriptionFive: Held weapons training and safety classes for 40-70 Navy Sailors to qualify Navy Sailors for various roles.
work.descriptionSix: Trained Navy Sailors in battlefield procedure and team dynamics

projects.title: My Planner
projects.category: A simple planner for easily managing tasks

projects.title: Stray Tracker
projects.category: A social media app I am building for communities to keep track of the furry critters that roam about their neighbordhoods.

testimonials.text: I have known Damon for most of my life and he has always been curious about technology. When Damon told me he wanted to become a software developer, I was excited to see his curiosity become a reality. As a Software Engineer, I have mentored a range of people and Damon has been one of the most motivated and determined I've helped. His problem solving skills from previous work experience no doubt has translated into his software development skills. I believe Damon would quickly become a strong member of any development team!
Damon is a persistent learner who gives a full effort and is always striving to push out a better application
